Privacy Policy

Our company is committed to protecting the privacy of our customers and users. We collect and use personal information only for the purposes of conducting business and providing better services. The information we collect may include:

  • Name, email address, and phone number
  • Payment information such as credit card details
  • Product preferences and order history

We use this information only to provide better services to our customers and do not share it with third parties without their consent, except where required by law. We also take reasonable steps to ensure the security of our customers' personal information and prevent unauthorized access or disclosure.
